Num.FuncTxt:
local pc = GetSkillOwner(obj)
local abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Appraiser1')
local time = 40000
if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then
time = time + (abil.Level * 1000)
end
return time;

end

return value

return buffTime

end

end
